Class BaseMutation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.session.transaction.BaseMutation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mutation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeleteMutation, WriteMutation

    public abstract class BaseMutation
extends Object
implements Mutation
    Base class to inherit from to implement specific mutations operation.
